column2:
```r
wvr[-nrow(wvr),-ncol(wvr)] %>% 
  gather(live, count, -area) %>% 
  rename(work = area) %>% 
  group_by(live) %>% 
  mutate(percent = count/sum(count)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  # filter(
  #   work %in% .GlobalEnv$work$area[1:50]
  #   # live %in% .GlobalEnv$live$area[1:50]
  #   ) %>% 
  mutate(km = dmx$dist[.match(paste(live, work), with(dmx, paste(from,to)))]) %>% 
  mutate(time = 60*km/(spdtb_0830$speed + spdtb_0830$km*km)) %>% 
  
  group_by(time < 30) %>% 
  summarise(count = sum(count)) %>% 
  mutate(share = count/sum(count))
```
